children.summaryData: Software Engineer specializing in modern web platforms and real world AI applications. I’ve spent over a decade designing, building, and scaling SaaS products. I lead frontend and backend work, own complex features end-to-end, and drive architectural decisions in multi-tenant, security-sensitive environments. My recent focus is on applied AI: validating prototypes, designing agentic workflows, and shipping LLM powered features into production with observability/monitoring. I bring a builder’s mindset, clear communication, and a consistent record of delivering customer focused impact.
